snippet: More than a dozen tax cuts are set to expire at the end of the year and a couple of new taxes will begin, affecting nearly 90 percent of taxpayers.
abstract: More than a dozen tax cuts are set to expire at the end of 2012 and a couple of new taxes will begin at the start of 2013, affecting nearly 90 percent of taxpayers.
lead_paragraph: More than a dozen tax cuts are set to expire at the end of the year and a couple of new taxes will begin, affecting nearly 90 percent of taxpayers.

headline.seo: A Roundup of Coming Tax Changes for Individuals
headline.main: Higher Taxes Are to Start With Flip of a Calendar
headline.print_headline: Higher Taxes Are to Start With Flip of a Calendar
